speaker:
DON
               
              JOHN
text: It is so. The Count Claudio shall marry the

speaker:
DON
               
              JOHN
text: daughter of Leonato.

speaker: BORACHIO
text: Yea, my lord, but I can cross it.

speaker:
DON
               
              JOHN
text: Any bar, any cross, any impediment will be

speaker:
DON
               
              JOHN
text: med’cinable to me. I am sick in displeasure to him,

speaker:
DON
               
              JOHN
text: and whatsoever comes athwart his affection ranges

speaker:
DON
               
              JOHN
text: evenly with mine. How canst thou cross this

speaker:
DON
               
              JOHN
text: marriage?

speaker: BORACHIO
text: Not honestly, my lord, but so covertly that

speaker: BORACHIO
text: no dishonesty shall appear in me.

speaker:
DON
               
              JOHN
text: Show me briefly how.

speaker: BORACHIO
text: I think I told your Lordship a year since,

speaker: BORACHIO
text: how much I am in the favor of Margaret, the

speaker: BORACHIO
text: waiting gentlewoman to Hero.

speaker:
DON
               
              JOHN
text: I remember.

speaker: BORACHIO
text: I can, at any unseasonable instant of the

speaker: BORACHIO
text: night, appoint her to look out at her lady’s chamber

speaker: BORACHIO
text: window.

speaker:
DON
               
              JOHN
text: What life is in that to be the death of this

speaker:
DON
               
              JOHN
text: marriage?

speaker: BORACHIO
text: The poison of that lies in you to temper. Go

speaker: BORACHIO
text: you to the Prince your brother; spare not to tell

speaker: BORACHIO
text: him that he hath wronged his honor in marrying

speaker: BORACHIO
text: the renowned Claudio, whose estimation do you

speaker: BORACHIO
text: mightily hold up, to a contaminated stale, such a

speaker: BORACHIO
text: one as Hero.

speaker:
DON
               
              JOHN
text: What proof shall I make of that?

speaker: BORACHIO
text: Proof enough to misuse the Prince, to vex

speaker: BORACHIO
text: Claudio, to undo Hero, and kill Leonato. Look you

speaker: BORACHIO
text: for any other issue?

speaker:
DON
               
              JOHN
text: Only to despite them I will endeavor

speaker:
DON
               
              JOHN
text: anything.

speaker: BORACHIO
text: Go then, find me a meet hour to draw Don

speaker: BORACHIO
text: Pedro and the Count Claudio alone. Tell them that

speaker: BORACHIO
text: you know that Hero loves me; intend a kind of zeal

speaker: BORACHIO
text: both to the Prince and Claudio, as in love of your

speaker: BORACHIO
text: brother’s honor, who hath made this match, and his

speaker: BORACHIO
text: friend’s reputation, who is thus like to be cozened

speaker: BORACHIO
text: with the semblance of a maid, that you have discovered

speaker: BORACHIO
text: thus. They will scarcely believe this without

speaker: BORACHIO
text: trial. Offer them instances, which shall bear no less

speaker: BORACHIO
text: likelihood than to see me at her chamber window,

speaker: BORACHIO
text: hear me call Margaret “Hero,” hear Margaret term

speaker: BORACHIO
text: me “Claudio,” and bring them to see this the very

speaker: BORACHIO
text: night before the intended wedding, for in the meantime

speaker: BORACHIO
text: I will so fashion the matter that Hero shall be

speaker: BORACHIO
text: absent, and there shall appear such seeming truth

speaker: BORACHIO
text: of Hero’s disloyalty that jealousy shall be called

speaker: BORACHIO
text: assurance and all the preparation overthrown.

speaker:
DON
               
              JOHN
text: Grow this to what adverse issue it can, I will

speaker:
DON
               
              JOHN
text: put it in practice. Be cunning in the working this,

speaker:
DON
               
              JOHN
text: and thy fee is a thousand ducats.

speaker: BORACHIO
text: Be you constant in the accusation, and my

speaker: BORACHIO
text: cunning shall not shame me.

speaker:
DON
               
              JOHN
text: I will presently go learn their day of

speaker:
DON
               
              JOHN
text: marriage.
